title: What Does the 🤞 Fingers Crossed Emoji Mean?

steps.title: They’re wishing for luck.
steps.content: They’re wishing for luck. If someone sends you a 🤞, it means they’re hoping for the best outcome. Maybe they have a test coming up, or they’re sending good vibes your way. Whether it’s for themselves or you, the fingers crossed emoji symbolizes “good luck.” [1] X Research source “Please tell me the test was easy🤞” “Rooting for you🤞🎉”

steps.title: They’re lying.
steps.content: They’re lying. Have you ever crossed your fingers behind your back while telling a little white lie? The 🤞 can mean the same thing as it does in real life. In this context, the fingers crossed emoji is a bit sarcastic as the sender knows you’ll know they’re lying. [2] X Research source “I told my dad I wouldn’t skip class🤞” “I didn’t eat the cake🤞”

steps.title: They’re close to someone.
steps.content: They’re close to someone. A 🤞 can symbolize a strong friendship or relationship. If they’re talking about their best friend, they may use this emoji to replace the word “close” or represent being their ride or die. [3] X Research source “Me and her are 🤞” “I don’t know what I would do without her🤞”

steps.title: They’re hoping everything will be okay.
steps.content: They’re hoping everything will be okay. The 🤞 can be used as a silent prayer or plea. In real life, crossing your fingers can be a superstitious act to make something better, and the 🤞 is no different. “All we can do is have faith🤞” “Please let me pass this final🤞”

steps.title: Send good luck.
steps.content: Send good luck. Add the 🤞 at the end of an encouraging message to wish a friend luck . This shows you have your fingers crossed for them, hoping everything will work out. [4] X Research source “Sending my best this morning, friend!🤞💖” “You’re going to be amazing🤞💕”

steps.title: Tell a white lie.
steps.content: Tell a white lie. Be a little sarcastic with a friend or crush and send them a 🤞 along with a message they know isn’t true. This is a great way to start some playful banter . [5] X Research source “I totally won’t be stopping at Starbucks every morning🤞🙃” “I don’t know where your sunglasses are🤞”

steps.title: Show how close you are to a friend.
steps.content: Show how close you are to a friend. The crossing of two fingers symbolizes a close-knit relationship, so use the 🤞 when you’re talking about your BFF. “We’re like this 🤞” “Together. Me and you🤞💕”

steps.title: Pray for a positive outcome.
steps.content: Pray for a positive outcome. If you’re superstitious, boost the likelihood of something good happening by using a 🤞. Add this emoji to the end of a hopeful text to show that you’re hoping for the best. [6] X Research source “Please help us get through this🤞😭” “I hope she comes home from the hospital soon🤞❤️”

steps.title: This emoji comes in five different skin tones.
steps.content: This emoji comes in five different skin tones. You can pick the emoji that fits you best for a customizable experience! Plus, it’ll help your friends imagine you crossing your fingers in real life. 🤞🏻: Light skin tone 🤞🏼: Medium-light skin tone 🤞🏽: Medium skin tone 🤞🏾: Medium-dark skin tone 🤞🏿: Dark skin tone
